goal:
SimpleComply engages in HealthCare Waste Management activities, such as onsite surveys, consulting, training and best practice solutions to minimize land-filling, incineration and unnecessary air, land and water pollution. SimpleComply allows Healthcare facilities to process their infectious and biohazardous waste on site.

The Healtcare Waste Management solution is a sustainable waste management approach, that immediately reduces the carbon footprint, minimizes risk to healthcare workers, significantly reduces landfilling and ultimately will lead to cleaner and safer environment.

We aim to have this solution implemented in every hospital around the world to locally treat their biohazardous waste on site or as close as possible to its source, according to the WHO.

In October, we presented our approach to reducing pharmaceutical waste in our water sources to the UNDP, and now we would like create more awareness about this approach as well as collaborate with other UN organizations with the aim of meeting SDG 6.

Simplecomply aims to enhance compliance within the Health Care industry with the objective of improving Health Care Waste Management.

Simplecomply’s mission is to empower healthcare organizations to simplify :
• the implementation of solutions, policies and procedures
• the alignment with healthcare standards and quality of care
• the challenges of achieving and maintaining compliance

Our goal is to make our customers feel their initiatives are acknowledged, valued, and carefully considered.
